name: Pac Man Clone
description:
WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Enter or Space to confirm your choice on the main menu

A clone of Pacman I made using "The Weekly Coder's" YouTube tutorial.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiRrp7UEG13a4DmYuNWHSoqLqNukEm9ua

Made purely for my educational purposes Namco if you need me to take this down I'll do it in a heartbeat.
